additional_media_info.title: Confucius's Direct Descendent, 76th generation, on RULES of the world
additional_media_info.description: Confucius was born more than 2500 years ago. His descendants today are all over the world. I spoke to one of the 76th generation, a political scientist and a scholar of today. He's full of thoughts!

additional_media_info.title: Confucius's Direct Descendent, 76th generation, on RULES of the world
additional_media_info.description: Confucius was born more than 2500 years ago. His descendants today are all over the world. I spoke to one of the 76th generation, a political scientist and a scholar of today. He's full of thoughts!

legacy.full_text: Meet a 76th generation descendant of #Confucius  Xinfeng, who  still lives & works in #ShanDong . As a political scientist, he IS opinionated, and strongly disagrees with the idea of "Clash of Civilisations". He's become a strong advocate for #TianXia  .#DiscoveringConfucius https://t.co/H6POiNLUev

speed up the region's goods & people flow"; said Lu Kang, China's Ambassador to #Indonesia @Amb_LuKang . He said developing economies don't want to stay at lower end of global supply chain, but need equal opportunity https://t.co/yPz1S8fEO5
